hymn.title: Marching on, marching on, in the Spirit

layout.singingstanza: March -- ing on, march -- ing on, in the Spir -- it march -- ing on; Hal -- le -- lu -- jah! the church -- es march on. March -- ing on, march -- ing on, in the Spir -- it march -- ing on; Hal -- le -- lu -- jah! the church -- es march on. In the church we see The Lord's re -- cov -- er -- y And for it the Spir -- it sev -- en- -- strong. The world will know, Wher -- ev -- er we shall go, That in our age the Lord's march -- ing on!

lyrics.stanza: Marching on, marching on, in the Spirit marching on; Hallelujah! the churches march on. Marching on, marching on, in the Spirit marching on; Hallelujah! the churches march on. In the church we see The Lord's recovery And for it the Spirit seven-strong. The world will know, Wherever we shall go, That in our age the Lord's marching on!
